subject: Wimbledon Tennis Tournament
Tennis
lead_paragraph: Roger Federer avenged a loss to Mario Ancic on the same Wimbledon Centre Court four years ago, winning 6-4, 6-4, 6-4 to reach his ninth consecutive Grand Slam semifinal.
snippet: Roger Federer avenged a loss to Mario Ancic on the same Wimbledon Centre Court four years ago, winning 6-4, 6-4, 6-4 to reach his ninth consecutive Grand Slam semifinal.
